item.title: Linux/Unix Learn Note
item.description: This is a note which recorded *nix cli command I learnt. It will be updated continuously. #Linux ##Process ###lsof Get which file was opened by pid. lsof -p pid Get which process opened this file. lsof /var/run/sendmail.pid Get file already been deleted but still held in /proc lsof | grep deleted cat /proc/pid/fd/dddd > /tmp/sample Get process using port 80 lsof -i :80 Get process communicating with 192.168.1.10 lsof -i @192.
